participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Cautious and thoughtful, Alex likes to plan things out before jumping in. He tends to be modest about his abilities but is determined to improve.
participant_1.background: I am still living at home at age 30. I am currently trying to open my own grocery store. I have a college degree in marketing. I am colorblind.

participant_2.name: Jamie
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and compassionate, Jamie has a strong connection with nature and animals. She's an outgoing individual who prefers the company of animals to people.
participant_2.background: I'm always looking for wildlife when I'm outside. I enjoy watching animal videos on the internet. I visit animal shelters fairly often. I get along better with animals than people.

content.text: Hi! I'm participant_1.
Hi participant_2. I'm participant_2.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to go hiking and explore nature. I'm always looking for wildlife when I'm outside.
That sounds like fun. I like to go hiking too, but I'm not very good at it.
Don't worry, it's a learning experience. I'm sure you'll get better at it the more you do it.
Thanks. I hope so. What else do you like to do for fun?
I enjoy watching animal videos on the internet. I also like to visit animal shelters.
That's cool. I love animals too. I don't know if I'm brave enough to work at an animal shelter though.
It's not as bad as you might think. It's actually really rewarding to help animals in need.
I can imagine. I'm sure it's a lot of work, but it's probably worth it.
It definitely is. I love being able to make a difference in the lives of animals.
That's awesome. I'm glad you have such a passion for animals.
Thanks. I'm glad too.
So, what do you do for work?
I'm a marketing manager at a local grocery store.
Oh, that's cool. I have a college degree in marketing too.
Really? That's awesome! What kind of marketing do you do?
I mostly do social media marketing and website design.
Oh, that's cool. I don't know much about social media marketing.
It's not too hard to learn. I'm sure you could pick it up if you wanted to.
Maybe I will. It might be a good way to get my foot in the door at another company.
That's a great idea. Good luck!
Thanks! You too!
